column1: Number and Percentage of Children with Medical Exemptions by Grade Type and County, New Jersey, 2024-2025

column2:
Percentages of children meeting all immunization requirements, with provisional admittance, with medical exemptions, and with religious exemptions in the reports do not sum to 100% due to a number of
children reported in enrollment with unknown status. See Methodology section for more information.
New Jersey Annual Immunization Status Reports, 2024-2025
